software.name: Interface
software.effect: Displays data

software.name: Intelligent Interface
software.effect: Artificial intelligence allows voice control and displays data intelligently. Required for using Expert software.

software.name: Security
software.effect: Security software packages defend against intrusion. Security/0 requires an Average (8+) Electronics (computers) check to successfully bypass.

software.name: Security
software.effect: Security software packages defend against intrusion. Security/1 requires a Difficult (10+) Electronics (computers) check to successfully bypass.

software.name: Security
software.effect: Security software packages defend against intrusion. Security/2 requires a Hard (12+) Electronics (computers) check to successfully bypass.

software.name: Security
software.effect: Security software packages defend against intrusion. Security/3 requires a Formidable (14+) Electronics (computers) check to successfully bypass.

software.name: Intrusion
software.effect: Intrusion software packages aid hacking attempts, giving a +1 bonus. Intrusion software is often illegal.

software.name: Intrusion
software.effect: Intrusion software packages aid hacking attempts, giving a +2 bonus. Intrusion software is often illegal.

software.name: Intrusion
software.effect: Intrusion software packages aid hacking attempts, giving a +3 bonus. Intrusion software is often illegal.

software.name: Intrusion
software.effect: Intrusion software packages aid hacking attempts, giving a +4 bonus. Intrusion software is often illegal.

software.name: Expert
software.effect: Expert software packages mimic skills. A Traveller using Expert may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 1. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted. If a Traveller already has the skill, then Expert grants DM+1 to his check.

software.name: Expert
software.effect: Expert software packages mimic skills. A Traveller using Expert may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 2. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted. If a Traveller already has the skill, then Expert grants DM+1 to his check.

software.name: Expert
software.effect: Expert software packages mimic skills. A Traveller using Expert may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 3. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted. If a Traveller already has the skill, then Expert grants DM+1 to his check.

software.name: Translator
software.effect: Translators are specialised Expert packages that only have Language skills. Provides a near-real-time translation.

software.name: Translator
software.effect: Translators are specialised Expert packages that only have Language skills. Provides a real-time translation and has a much better understanding of the nuances of language.

software.name: Database
software.effect: A database is a large store of information on a topic that can be searched with an Electronics (computers) check or using an Agent.

software.name: Agent
software.effect: Has an Electronics (computers) skill of 0, and can carry out tasks assigned to it with a modicum of intelligence. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.

software.name: Agent
software.effect: Has an Electronics (computers) skill of 1, and can carry out tasks assigned to it with a modicum of intelligence. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.

software.name: Agent
software.effect: Has an Electronics (computers) skill of 2, and can carry out tasks assigned to it with a modicum of intelligence. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.

software.name: Agent
software.effect: Has an Electronics (computers) skill of 3, and can carry out tasks assigned to it with a modicum of intelligence. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.

software.name: Intellect
software.effect: An improved Agent which can use Expert systems. Can simultaneously use 1 skill.

software.name: Intellect
software.effect: An improved Agent which can use Expert systems. Can simultaneously use 2 skills.

software.name: Intellect
software.effect: An improved Agent which can use Expert systems. Can simultaneously use 3 skills.
